keyword: how many calories in a strip steak
title: How Many Calories in a Strip Steak?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a strip steak (about 425 kcal for a 6 oz grilled serving), plus protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Strip Steak?
assumptions: Boneless New York strip steak, choice grade, grilled without added fat, excess fat trimmed, 6 oz (170 g) cooked weight.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, portion size, and trimming; check labels or USDA data for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A 6 oz grilled strip steak provides ~425 kcal and ~46 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a strip steak per ounce?
faqs.a: About 71 kcal per oz for a grilled choice strip steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one strip steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 46 g protein in a 6 oz grilled strip steak.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in strip steak?
faqs.a: Yes—grilling keeps it lower; frying or adding fats increases calories by 40+ kcal.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a strip steak?
faqs.a: Around 25 g total fat, including 10 g saturated, for a 170 g serving.

faqs.q: Are strip steaks high in cholesterol?
faqs.a: Moderate—about 140 mg per 6 oz serving, mainly from the meat's natural content.
